events.message: Customer submitted a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision on the highway.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to car collision details provided.
An experienced claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle the case promptly.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request was made for police report, photos of damaged vehicle, and medical reports related to the accident.
Customer uploaded all requested documents, including accident report and repair estimates for review.
Investigation initiated to verify accident circumstances and evaluate insurance coverage applicability.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the claim was valid and covered under the policy terms.
Settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on vehicle damage assessment and policy limits.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with claim handling.
Claim officially approved by insurance management after all reviews and customer acceptance.
Payment for vehicle repairs was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim was closed after full payment and confirmation that all procedures were complete.
